REPORT: NBA INVESTIGATED KAWHI LEONARD’S UNCLE DENNIS FOR IMPROPER DEMANDS

BY MARCEL MUTONI DECEMBER 24, 2019 

Kawhi Leonard‘s uncle Dennis Robertson reportedly sought improper benefits during last summer’s free agency period, leading to an NBA investigation of the LA Clippers.
Robertson is said to have asked teams pursuing Leonard⁠—in addition to the max deal he signed⁠—part ownership, a private plane, housing and endorsement dollars.

Improper requests, an investigation, and a superstar chase gone sideways: The untold stories from Kawhi Leonard's free agency that left the Lakers fuming, at @TheAthletichttps://t.co/utxx7r7z2P
— Sam Amick (@sam_amick) December 23, 2019

No evidence was found that the Clippers agreed to grant any of the lavish requests, which would have circumvented the League’s salary cap rules.
Per The Athletic:

“We did tell our teams (at the Board of Governors meeting in New York in late September) that we are looking into and continue to look into activities from this summer,” [commissioner Adam] Silver told The Athletic earlier this season when asked if the Clippers were under investigation. “I will also say that we (were) trying to draw a line at this board meeting, and focus everyone on the (free agency) rules going forward. I think that (I’ll) just leave it at that. We are looking at the behavior from the summer. We have and we continue to look at it, but first and foremost we want to change the way business is done going forward.”
The stories about Robertson’s wish list made their way to the league office soon after Leonard made his decision, with concerned parties reporting that Leonard’s uncle had asked pursuing teams for much, much more than a max contract (Kawhi ultimately signed a three-year, $103 million deal with the Clippers). Sources say the league was told that Robertson asked team officials for part ownership of the team, a private plane that would be available at all times, a house and  — last but certainly not least — a guaranteed amount of off-court endorsement money that they could expect if Leonard played for their team. All of those items, to be clear, would fall well outside the confines of the league’s collective bargaining agreement.
A source with knowledge of the Kawhi-Lakers talks said Robertson made those requests repeatedly to owner Jeanie Buss over the course of three phone calls that spanned several days, and that she made it clear that such perks were illegal and would not be considered. There was even a question raised by Robertson about why Lakers legend Magic Johnson had been given a small piece of Lakers ownership so many years ago, with Buss explaining that the two situations couldn’t have been more different – even beyond the fact that one was legal and the other was not.

曝Kyrie Irving可能需要再缺陣2至3週的時間

Netsdaily今日引述Heavy.com記者Brandon Robinson報導，籃網控球後衛Kyrie Irving可能因為胸滑囊液炎（thoracic bursitis）的傷勢而缺陣2-3個星期的時間。

Netsdaily的撰文人表示，籃網去月宣佈Kyrie Irving因為肩關節夾擠症候群 (shoulder impingement) 而需要休戰。胸滑囊液炎和肩關節夾擠症候群事實上是大同小異的病症。比起肩關節夾擠症候群，胸滑囊液炎的症狀更為具體。事實上Kyrie Irving的傷勢仍然是肩傷問題。

在北京時間11月13日對陣爵士的比賽中右肩撞傷，兩日後他意外地在和金塊的比賽中帶傷出戰。這場比賽後他因為肩部傷勢缺席了至今的所有比賽。

Netsdaily今日引述Heavy.com記者Brandon Robinson報導，籃網控球後衛Kyrie Irving可能因為胸滑囊液炎（thoracic bursitis）的傷勢而缺陣2-3個星期的時間。

Netsdaily的撰文人表示，籃網去月宣佈Kyrie Irving因為肩關節夾擠症候群 (shoulder impingement) 而需要休戰。胸滑囊液炎和肩關節夾擠症候群事實上是大同小異的病症。比起肩關節夾擠症候群，胸滑囊液炎的症狀更為具體。事實上Kyrie Irving的傷勢仍然是肩傷問題。

在北京時間11月13日對陣爵士的比賽中右肩撞傷，兩日後他意外地在和金塊的比賽中帶傷出戰。這場比賽後他因為肩部傷勢缺席了至今的所有比賽。

quote.msg:
REPORT: NBA INVESTIGATED KAWHI LEONARD’S UNCLE DENNIS FOR IMPROPER DEMANDS

BY MARCEL MUTONI DECEMBER 24, 2019 

Kawhi Leonard‘s uncle Dennis Robertson reportedly sought improper benefits during last summer’s free agency period, leading to an NBA investigation of the LA Clippers.
Robertson is said to have asked teams pursuing Leonard⁠—in addition to the max deal he signed⁠—part ownership, a private plane, housing and endorsement dollars.

Improper requests, an investigation, and a superstar chase gone sideways: The untold stories from Kawhi Leonard's free agency that left the Lakers fuming, at @TheAthletichttps://t.co/utxx7r7z2P
— Sam Amick (@sam_amick) December 23, 2019

No evidence was found that the Clippers agreed to grant any of the lavish requests, which would have circumvented the League’s salary cap rules.
Per The Athletic:

“We did tell our teams (at the Board of Governors meeting in New York in late September) that we are looking into and continue to look into activities from this summer,” [commissioner Adam] Silver told The Athletic earlier this season when asked if the Clippers were under investigation. “I will also say that we (were) trying to draw a line at this board meeting, and focus everyone on the (free agency) rules going forward. I think that (I’ll) just leave it at that. We are looking at the behavior from the summer. We have and we continue to look at it, but first and foremost we want to change the way business is done going forward.”
The stories about Robertson’s wish list made their way to the league office soon after Leonard made his decision, with concerned parties reporting that Leonard’s uncle had asked pursuing teams for much, much more than a max contract (Kawhi ultimately signed a three-year, $103 million deal with the Clippers). Sources say the league was told that Robertson asked team officials for part ownership of the team, a private plane that would be available at all times, a house and  — last but certainly not least — a guaranteed amount of off-court endorsement money that they could expect if Leonard played for their team. All of those items, to be clear, would fall well outside the confines of the league’s collective bargaining agreement.
A source with knowledge of the Kawhi-Lakers talks said Robertson made those requests repeatedly to owner Jeanie Buss over the course of three phone calls that spanned several days, and that she made it clear that such perks were illegal and would not be considered. There was even a question raised by Robertson about why Lakers legend Magic Johnson had been given a small piece of Lakers ownership so many years ago, with Buss explaining that the two situations couldn’t have been more different – even beyond the fact that one was legal and the other was not.
舅父

出手少過11次的比賽熱火全勝！Butler：若能贏，零出手都沒問題！

對於自己佔用了非常少的球權一事，Jimmy Butler在接受媒體採訪時也談到了自己的看法。

在此前熱火以129-114戰勝尼克斯的比賽，Jimmy Butler全場更是只出手了3次，得到9分5板8助3抄截1蓋帽的數據。

Butler說道：“如果能夠保證贏球，出手零次也沒有問題。在我的職業生涯，我一直都不是一個出手很多的球員。”

“球隊的每一個人都願意分享球，也很喜歡看到其他隊員得分，我認為這是非常重要的事情。當隊友無人盯防時，你就應該充滿信心，相信他們會命中投籃。”Butler補充道。

I'm a fan of Vince Carter. He was certainly a very exciting slam dunker who was worty his weight in gold to Raptors. Don't get me wrong- I still enjoy watching him play even though his prime has passed. He proved his worth to Raptors by helping win multiple championships. His worth to the team was incalculable. I must say he's made significant progress with his three point shooting since he joined Nets. Unfortunately his leg injury has progressed fairly rapidly in the last ten months forcing him to be sidelined for five week through injury. He complained that taking a five-week hiatus was too long but it's for his own benefit. He has a follow-up to the doctor next week. His friend LeBron James will also be out of commission until his back heals. He has made little progress with his shooting since he injured his back. His doctor said he was making good progress and will check on his progress next month. He assigned the blame for his injury to a lack of stretching and training. Oh well it could be worse. His worth of contribution to Lakers is incalculable. Lakers is as likely to beat warriors as Cavaliers in my opinion. Lakers didn't just beat Bulls the other day. Lakers wiped the floor with Bulls. LeBron cried to Bulls "In your face!" when Lakers won. Bulls has lost its edge to some extent since its point leaders left the team. Recently Suns edged out Bulls by two points which reminded me of warriors edging out Cavaliers by one point. The responsibilities of every coach in every team are well defined. Everybody has a major role to play in every team. In addition the government has created a commission to investigate the use of steroids among players. Another commission has also been appointed to look at family violence in NBA which I wholeheartedly support. Yesterday I had my personal training session in the gym and was soaking wet then I soaked in a jacuzzi. The gym is situated beside the jacuzzi where you can see the inside of the gym clearly. i saw a slim guy lift a very light two pound dumbbell for all he was worth but still couldn't complete the exercise. i enjoy hitting the gym and i know my personal trainer is worth her salt as I'm making good progress with my physique. She's a vivacious in-your-face woman who's sometimes too honest for her own good.

香港時間12月26日，聖誕大戰第三場，勇士在主場以116-104擊敗火箭。勇士正選得分後衛達米安-李爾出場31分鐘，得到22分、15個籃板、4次助攻和3次偷球。

作為一名身背雙向合同的球員，達米安-李爾在今天這場聖誕大戰的表現非常搶眼，他正選出場31分鐘，9投5中，三分球2投2中，罰球10中10，得到22分、15個籃板、4次助攻和3次偷球。在勇士飽受傷病困擾的情況下，達米安-李爾為勇士隊的後場提供了非常需要的幫助。

但是勇士隊現在面臨一個尷尬的處境，由於硬工資帽的限制，勇士隊無法將李爾的雙向合同轉正，而且身背雙向合同的球員有45天的轉正時間。

NBA專家波比-馬克斯在Twitter上指出，由於勇士隊硬工資帽的限制，他們無法填補陣容的最後一個席位，也不能將達米安-李爾或者凱-鮑曼的雙向合同轉正。但如果勇士能夠清理一下陣容空間的話，比如交易阿萊克-博克斯的合同，同時不接受任何薪水合同，那麼情況會有所改變。如果能得到一名板凳射手，一些球隊可能願意送出一個未來的二輪簽。

馬克斯還指出，如果勇士隊不能清理薪金空間，他們只能等到明年3月8日才能簽回達米安-李爾。

達米安-李爾是2016年的落選新秀，2018年夏天，他以一份雙向合同加盟勇士。當然，達米安-李爾還有一個非常特殊的身份，他就是史提芬-居里的妹夫。

香港時間12月26日，據《Clutch Points》報導，前NBA球員夏寧頓表示，他希望NBA 能將大麻合法化，但並非為了享樂，而是讓受到傷痛困擾的NBA球員們吸食大麻，也能達到和服用其他藥物同樣的，甚至更佳的效果。

現年39歲的前NBA球員Padraig (Al) Harrington如今搖身一變，成為了鼓吹NBA大麻合法化的人士之一，並擁有了一家相關大麻製品公司。他堅信，服用大麻製品對NBA球員而言，能達到和服用其他藥物同等的效果。尤其是那些接受了手術的球員，醫生們往往會給他們開出止痛藥，其中有些藥物也能讓球員們“上癮”。

“我認為那些日複一日遭受傷痛困擾的球員們，可以借助大麻製品來對抗傷痛，”Padraig Harrington在接受《華盛頓郵報》記者Candace Buckner採訪時說，“這些大麻製品是純天然的，絕對不會像他們正在服用的藥物那樣會產生強烈的副作用。”

Padraig Harrington的意圖很明顯，他並非是在鼓吹通過吸食大麻獲得快感，而是希望NBA球員在對抗傷痛時，能找到除止痛藥之外的其他替代藥物。既然“是藥三分毒”，那麼為何可以服用止痛藥，卻要將大麻排斥在外？

Padraig Harrington還稱，他非常清楚，要想真正推動NBA大麻合法化，還需要得到球員們的支持，且球員們還要公開說出自己的想法，而非只是在道義上支持他。

“畢竟我在聯盟待過很久，因此我深知，要想真正做成這件事，首先還得靠球員們自己，”Padraig Harrington說，“只有這樣才能真正掃除前進路上的障礙。”

1998年選秀，Padraig Harrington在首輪第25順位被溜馬選中，此後他輾轉過鷹隊、勇士、紐約人、金塊、魔術和巫師，生涯共出戰981場常規賽，先發445場，場均出戰28.6分鐘，得到13.5分5.6個籃板，命中率44.4%。

Padraig Harrington的倡議能在NBA獲得響應，並最終通過嗎？

REPORT: NBA INVESTIGATED KAWHI LEONARD’S UNCLE DENNIS FOR IMPROPER DEMANDS

BY MARCEL MUTONI DECEMBER 24, 2019 

Kawhi Leonard‘s uncle Dennis Robertson reportedly sought improper benefits during last summer’s free agency period, leading to an NBA investigation of the LA Clippers.
Robertson is said to have asked teams pursuing Leonard⁠—in addition to the max deal he signed⁠—part ownership, a private plane, housing and endorsement dollars.

Improper requests, an investigation, and a superstar chase gone sideways: The untold stories from Kawhi Leonard's free agency that left the Lakers fuming, at @TheAthletichttps://t.co/utxx7r7z2P
— Sam Amick (@sam_amick) December 23, 2019

No evidence was found that the Clippers agreed to grant any of the lavish requests, which would have circumvented the League’s salary cap rules.
Per The Athletic:

“We did tell our teams (at the Board of Governors meeting in New York in late September) that we are looking into and continue to look into activities from this summer,” [commissioner Adam] Silver told The Athletic earlier this season when asked if the Clippers were under investigation. “I will also say that we (were) trying to draw a line at this board meeting, and focus everyone on the (free agency) rules going forward. I think that (I’ll) just leave it at that. We are looking at the behavior from the summer. We have and we continue to look at it, but first and foremost we want to change the way business is done going forward.”
The stories about Robertson’s wish list made their way to the league office soon after Leonard made his decision, with concerned parties reporting that Leonard’s uncle had asked pursuing teams for much, much more than a max contract (Kawhi ultimately signed a three-year, $103 million deal with the Clippers). Sources say the league was told that Robertson asked team officials for part ownership of the team, a private plane that would be available at all times, a house and  — last but certainly not least — a guaranteed amount of off-court endorsement money that they could expect if Leonard played for their team. All of those items, to be clear, would fall well outside the confines of the league’s collective bargaining agreement.
A source with knowledge of the Kawhi-Lakers talks said Robertson made those requests repeatedly to owner Jeanie Buss over the course of three phone calls that spanned several days, and that she made it clear that such perks were illegal and would not be considered. There was even a question raised by Robertson about why Lakers legend Magic Johnson had been given a small piece of Lakers ownership so many years ago, with Buss explaining that the two situations couldn’t have been more different – even beyond the fact that one was legal and the other was not.

尷尬嗰個係 Ball

【聖誕大戰「全新轉播視角」引發巨大反應，球迷齊聲呼籲：拜託別再轉了！】

今天是一年一度的聖誕大戰，同城的雙雄對決，洛杉磯湖人和洛杉磯快艇的較量吸引了無數人的目光，開幕戰湖人敗給快艇後，今天對他們來說是一場復仇之戰，而且這也很可能是西區決賽的預演，所以自然是各界關注ˇ的最大焦點。

但今天這場比賽有一個項目卻引發了諸多人的討論，那就是「轉播視角」。

一般來說，比賽的絕大部分時間，大家都是習慣看正常視角，也就是從球場側面從上往下45度角觀看，雖然有時會穿插一些其他角度的視角，但那畢竟是非常非常少數的時間，也就是以下的這種畫面。

但今天，美國的轉播單位卻使用了一種側角度的轉播視角，也就是從球場一邊，像坐直升機一般的視角，隨著球帶過半場，逐漸把鏡頭帶過去，這是一種全新的觀看模式，相當新奇。

但這卻讓非常多已經習慣一般視角的球迷相當不習慣，紛紛對這個新的轉播角度表示反彈，「到底是哪來的主意阿？」、「拜託別再轉了」、「根本就是垃圾視角」，看起來這個新的轉播角度相當不受到歡迎。

replies.msg: 唯一比 Kelly 好嘅係高度 但我唔覺得係佢身上有幾大優勢唔明點解佢會腳步慢成咁 身型好fit 但速度同Lopez 一樣

距離NBA聖誕大戰已經過去了兩天，但是關於那場萬眾矚目洛城德比的話題依然沒有停息。今日，作為Leonard與庫茲馬的訓練師Clint Parks在社交INS上發文：再看昨日Leonard（聖誕大戰）的比賽集錦，沒人想討論這個話題，相比詹姆斯而言，他的技術有多麼的出色。顯而易見，有人是真正的在努力訓練，有人卻不是這樣。有什麼藉口儘管講，我在度假，有的是時間。……看看錄像，有人昨天一直在躲著不敢對位，那個人不是Leonard哦。


對於這位訓練師的言論，湖人球員庫茲馬給出的評論是：「實話實說」，隨後他又刪掉了這一評論。我們可以這樣理解這位訓練師的言論，首先，他表揚了Leonard的出色表現，也肯定了Leonard訓練的態度，畢竟是自己參與的訓練，拿他與詹姆斯作比較，覺得Leonard的技術要更出色，但是他同時又在嘲諷一位湖人球迷，很明顯是在球場上與Leonard對位的，而且在他眼里是有意躲著不敢去直接對位的球員，並表示他沒有努力訓練，那麼他說的是誰呢？


不用說我們都能猜到，湖人除了戴維斯與詹姆斯，沒有誰的表現會被這位訓練師在意，那麼對位的球員當然就是老詹了，那場比賽，詹姆斯24投9中，三分球更是12中2，拿到23分9板10助攻，關鍵三分被Beverley封蓋，而Leonard 19中11，三分球7中5，高效的砍下35分12板5助攻，在球場上Leonard的表現是要壓制詹姆斯的，無論是進攻還是防守。作為Leonard訓練師嘲諷老詹可以理解，但是庫茲馬這一言論似乎有點無腦了，怎麼可以幫著對手諷刺自己的隊友了，而且還是球隊老大。


在昨日爆料的賽後採訪中，庫茲馬也評價了老詹的最後一投，他表示那一球老詹太猶豫，如果換了Kobe絕對堅決的投籃，尤其是面對Beverley這個小後衛。那麼美媒爆料的湖人總裁卡佩林希望通過交易庫茲馬進行補強，看來已經勢在必行了，經歷了4連敗的湖人隊內已經出現了問題，問題而且還不小，大家覺得不是嗎？

就用榮光 夫子 同 疑似晏慕龍嘅名義搞左個so call Christmas party 原訂今日 一開始就話收錢嘅 同會搵戴祖儀 但俾人chok兩野就改免費 同2打6 同一時間 連登會員夫子更出左澄清 話官方gp入面嘅唔係佢添


咁唔少人就覺得奇啦 戴祖儀cctvb人唔會冒險出席用榮光做開頭嘅活動 而新請嘅2打6嘉賓都係cctvb訓練班人
開始有啲懷疑個活動本質係咩呢 於是 就有人私下問左真.晏慕龍啦 點知佢斷言話tg慕龍不是其本人

咁一直就去到今日 正常要搞party嘅日子 假夫子同假慕龍就同時話要順延 到31號先搞 眾gp友群起逼宮 最後一率被禁言



係唔係打算食人血饅頭 同 呃人就閣下自己判斷
